name: Cor Lapis
desc: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

customize.name: Changshun
customize.desc: A businesswoman and researcher who specializes in Liyue Mercantilism. Despite rigorously researching and consolidating a successful business strategy, she laments that her shop has never had the honor of Rex Lapis' personal patronage. It is said that all shops that have welcomed Rex Lapis' presence and approval have all become famous household names.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Qiuwei
customize.desc: An authorized retailer for the Feiyun Commerce Guild. The Liyue specialties she sells are highly popular with Sumeru residents.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Zhongli
customize.desc: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

customize.name: Chongyun
customize.desc: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

customize.name: Geoculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc:
A stone that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby Geoculi.
This exquisite stone plate imitates a certain mysterious quality of the Geo Statues of The Seven, causing it to lead people to the location of Geoculi.
Elemental Oculi represent the lost power of the Statues of The Seven — perhaps offering this power back to the statues also has significance for the lands that the gods watch over.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Cor Lapis
customize.desc: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

customize.name: Glaze Lily
customize.desc: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

customize.name: Dustproof Potion
customize.desc:
A potion that boosts Geo RES and keeps one from getting bothered by sand and dust.
It has a strange taste not unlike that of magnets. It keeps a traveler clean from all the sand and dust out there.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Butterfly Wings
customize.desc: Brightly colored wings. The powder that falls from them shimmers a little. Perhaps this is what allows them to fly?

customize.name: Cor Lapis
customize.desc: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

customize.name: Unmoving Essential Oil
customize.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Geo, boosting Geo DMG.
You can feel the fine Geo pellets within when applied. It's said to help with physical injuries.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Frog
customize.desc: Common frog found in moist environments. Full of energy, they secrete a substance that will keep you full of vitality.

customize.name: Cor Lapis
customize.desc: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

customize.name: Geo Treasure Compass
customize.desc:
A compass that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby chests.
The land of Geo is rich with valuable resources, with treasures hidden throughout the mountains and wilderness just waiting to be found.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Golden Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

customize.name: Cor Lapis
customize.desc: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

customize.name: Yellow Dye
customize.desc: Yellow dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

customize.name: Cor Lapis
customize.desc: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

value.text:
Found under cliffs in Liyue
Recommendation: Found on Mt. Hulao
